htmlform.formDescription: Summary entry form for patients enrolled for ART

td.label: Do you have any household member attending the clinic?

p.label: If from MJAP clinic Previous clinic#:

td.label: Who Referred you to the clinic?
Who Referred you to the clinic?
Directions to client's/Child's Home(specifiy clearly the land marks e.g. school, transformers e.t.c)

obs.labelText: Did the mother receive any ARVs ante/intra and or postpartum(PMTCT)?
Is the Child currently being breastfed?
If yes, is the child receiving any other foods/liquids other than breast milk(including water)?
Does the child meet age appropriate development milestones?
If female, (adolescent), last normal menstrual period

td.b: Name of family members and Partners

obs.answerLabels: AZT-3TC-NVP, AZT-3TC-EFV, D4T-3TC-NVP, D4T-3TC-EFV, TDF-3TC-NVP, TDF-3TC-EFV, TDF-FTC-NVP, TDF-FTC-EFV,ABC-3TC-NVP,ABC-3TC-EFV,ABC-3TC-LPV/r,OTHER

obs.labelText: Treated for TB in the past:
Any one diagnosed with TB in household?

section.h3: ART treatment interruptions - STOP or MISSED drug pick up
